short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.
tags: Lake resource or offshore capabilities are not the letting criteria, the full requirements related to offshore ar\u003e982.e must be met.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement Lighting and Components**

**Reference:** cb-157-39484871

**Amendment:** 10

**Publication Date:** 2023-09-26

**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-12-08T14:00:00

**Solicitation Number:** W8482-241769/A

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Request for Price (RFP) Description:**

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a supplier to provide lighting components and lamps to support their facilities at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.

**Key Items:**

- Lighting lamps with xenon vapour (6 units)
- Fluorescent lamp (2500 units and 2000 units)
- Incandescent lamp (1200 units and 800 units)
- Flash tube lamp (18 units and 10 units)
- Incandescent lamp (35 units and 30 units)
- Incandescent lamp (25 units and 34 units)
- Fluorescent lamp (75 units and 75 units)
- Fluorescent lamp (500 units and 500 units)

**Additional Requirements:**

- Bidders must provide prices in Canadian dollars.
- The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers.
- Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Trade Agreements:**

- Please refer to the Tender Description or Tender Documents for trade agreements.

**Regions of Opportunity:**

- Nova Scotia
- British Columbia

**Regions of Delivery:**

- CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
- CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

**Submission Information:**

- Interested bidders must submit their proposal electronically through the Project Management Office (PMO).
- Contact: Christopher Cauchi at christopher.cauchi@forces.gc.ca or (555) 555-5555.

The above text was mostly copied and pasted from the original entry with the original fields key values inserted. 
I have made an attempt to remove unnecessary information as well as removing paragraphs which weren't adding any significant information to the overall text. 

You can notice the above entry is barely smaller than the original 1800-words. I found it was hard to cut words while maintaining meaning to it. You could ask for any clarification or restructuring according to your needs.  Choices where have been made along the way such as splitting original fields into two lines
